article_title: Doctors Send $1.6M A Year To Hospitals Despite Value-Based Care Push

article_metadata.description: Physicians are generating more revenue for hospitals even as insurers and the government shift more dollars away from fee-for-service medicine toward value-based care. Revenue per physician is $1.56 million compared to $1.45 million three years ago.
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Physicians are generating more revenue for hospitals even as insurers and the government shift more dollars away from fee-for-service medicine toward value-based care. Revenue per physician is $1.56 million compared to $1.45 million three years ago.
og.title: Doctors Send $1.6M A Year To Hospitals Despite Value-Based Care Push
